basics.name: Sara Ramaiah
basics.label: Research Assistant
basics.summary: Research scientist specializing in bioinformatics tools and applications, currently applying to MD/PhD programs with the intent to pursue clinical research in neurology.

work.name: University Hospitals
work.summary: On a high-acuity medical-surgical floor, cared for up to 15 patients simultaneously, maintaining hygeine, comfort, and safety alongside nursing staff.

work.name: Burberry Lab, CWRU Department of Pathology
work.summary: Starting as an undergraduate and graduating to a full-time position, I specialized in bioinformatics while maintaining deep involvement in hands-on benchtop lab work.

volunteer.summary: Provided comfort items and refreshments to cancer center patients, and transported both hospital laboratory samples and blood bank products to facilitate quick patient care.

awards.title: Harlan G. Wood Prize
awards.summary: Awarded to seniors completing the B.S. in Biochemistry with the highest overall grades.

awards.title: Phi Beta Kappa Award
awards.summary: Awarded to one graduating high school senior for excellence in scholarship, service, and leadership.
